resources.string: We just need your registered Email Id to sent you password reset instructions.

Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn’t do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover.
Know about any City with just a single Click. Locate cities and locate yourself. Search for any palce and pack your bag.
Save your past Memories, Plan new Trips and wish for more. Share experiences with your friends and invite them for more!!
“Traveling – it leaves you speechless, then turns you into a storyteller.” – Ibn Battuta
Bunny\'s Diary is the combined effort of following three 3rd year students of MNNIT, Allahabad. Hope you are liking this Android Project.For any Query feel free to contact.
